Packet Utilization Standard (PUS)

Detailed Description

This module gathers together the key classes that support the implementation of the services defined by the Packet Utilization Standard (PUS).

Note that the support of PUS services in the OBS Framework is integrated within the management of telecommands and telemetry. This module only lists PUS-specific classes but support to PUS service implementation is also provided by classes in the Telecommand Management and Telemery Management modules.
